item.title: Fitness
item.description: Fitness is my catch-all for anything related to health, strength training, and movement. Whenever I jot down a habit, a workout idea, or a note about recovery, I link it back here so I can quickly find what matters.

item.title: Next
item.description: “Next” is where I jot down anything that feels like the step after today’s routine: experiments I want to try, articles I want to revisit, habits that need more teeth.

item.title: Pull-Up Progress
item.description: I have been trying to get better at pull ups since personal fitness class in highschool. Its like all exercies related activities, you pray once again each year that you will hit your goal of 10 confident pull ups.
